title: Experience the Power of Hypnotic Ecstasy/ Compilation of Mind Expanding Hypnosis techniques
description:
To be in a trance state of hypnotic ecstasy means to be connected to the universe. Taking on Mudra position is beneficial for this state and it deepens it. Dr. Marco Paret and his students experience the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques at his school. They become professional hypnotherapists and solve problems, often considered impossible to solve. Non-verbal hypnosis Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
